languages.text: "Маршал Стракс! Вы слышали мои доводы и искаженную правду префекта. Вам еще недостаточно сведений, чтобы обличить настоящего преступника?"
"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"
languages.original_text: "Маршал Стракс! Вы слышали мои доводы и искаженную правду префекта. Вам еще недостаточно сведений, чтобы обличить настоящего преступника?"

traits.locale_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Enough. It is time to stop believing every word she says. Do your duty to the Arbites and punish the real criminal here."
"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Enough. It is time to stop believing every word she says. Do your duty to the Arbites and punish the real criminal here."
"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"
"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"
"Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

languages.text: "Marschall Strachs! Ihr habt meine Argumente und von der Präfektin deren verzerrte Version der Wahrheit gehört. Benötigt Ihr noch mehr Informationen, bevor Ihr den wahren Schuldigen verurteilt?"
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: "Marschall Strachs! Ihr habt meine Argumente und von der Präfektin deren verzerrte Version der Wahrheit gehört. Benötigt Ihr noch mehr Informationen, bevor Ihr den wahren Schuldigen verurteilt?"

languages.text: « Maréchal Strachs ! Vous avez entendu mes arguments ainsi que le simulacre de vérité présenté par la préfète. Avez-vous besoin d'autres informations avant de prendre une décision sur le véritable coupable ? »
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: « Maréchal Strachs ! Vous avez entendu mes arguments ainsi que le simulacre de vérité présenté par la préfète. Avez-vous besoin d'autres informations avant de prendre une décision sur le véritable coupable ? »

languages.text: “斯塔克斯元帅！你已经听到了行政官歪曲事实的说法，也听到了我的辩驳。你还需要我提供更多信息，才能惩罚真正的罪犯吗？”
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: “斯塔克斯元帅！你已经听到了行政官歪曲事实的说法，也听到了我的辩驳。你还需要我提供更多信息，才能惩罚真正的罪犯吗？”
“斯塔克斯元帅！你已经听到了行政官歪曲事实的说法，也听到了我的辩驳。这一切都该结束了，别再相信她说出的每句话了。履行帝国法务部的义务，惩罚真正的罪犯吧。”

languages.text: «¡Mariscal Strachs! Ha escuchado mis argumentos y las verdades tergiversadas de la prefecta. ¿Acaso necesita más información para condenar a la verdadera culpable?».
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mariscal Strachs! Ha escuchado mis argumentos y las verdades tergiversadas de la prefecta. ¿Acaso necesita más información para condenar a la verdadera culpable?».

languages.text: 「ストラッチス将帥！君は{mf|俺|私}の主張も、そして総監による歪められた真実も聞いただろう。真の犯人を非難する前に、さらに情報が必要か？」
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: 「ストラッチス将帥！君は{mf|俺|私}の主張も、そして総監による歪められた真実も聞いただろう。真の犯人を非難する前に、さらに情報が必要か？」
「ストラッチス将帥！君は{mf|俺|私}の主張も、そして総監による歪められた真実も聞いただろう。もうたくさんだ。彼女の言葉をすべて鵜呑みにするのはやめるんだ。高等裁定局への義務を果たし、この場の真の犯罪者に裁きを下せ」

languages.text: "Miralay Strachs! Hem benim argümanlarımı hem de prefektin çarpıtarak anlattıklarını dinledin. Gerçek suçluyu ifşa etmek için bu bilgiler yeterli değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! You have heard my arguments and the prefect's distorted version of the truth. Do you require yet more information before you denounce the real culprit?"

traits.locale_text: "Miralay Strachs! Hem benim argümanlarımı hem de prefektin çarpıtarak anlattıklarını dinledin. Gerçek suçluyu ifşa etmek için bu bilgiler yeterli değil mi?"

"Miralay Strachs! Hem benim argümanlarımı hem de prefektin çarpıtarak anlattıklarını dinledin. Yetti artık şunun her sözüne kandığın... Arbites mensubu olarak vazifeni yap, kim gerçek suçluysa onu cezalandır."
